description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Bean Burrito recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burrito,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Fakeaway,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Peanut free
name: Beef & Bean Burrito Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook onion for 5 minutes until softened. Add beef and cook for 5 minutes, stirring to break up lumps. Add Black Beans, Burrito Spice Mix and 3/4 cup water, and stir. Cook for 3 minutes or until thickened.
For toasted tortillas, heat a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat and brown each tortilla for 10 seconds on one side only. Wrap in a tea towel until ready to serve.
Build your own burrito with lettuce, beef and bean mixture, cheese, avocado and Mild Mexican Salsa.
